column4: The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year by Semester.
The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year by Quarter.
The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year by Trimester.
The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year by 4-1-4 or similar plan.
The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year by an academic plan not yet defined in CEDS.
The method by which an institution structures most of its courses for the academic year differs by program.
The institution structures most of its courses for the academic year on a continuous basis.
